entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are the family that Harry lives with. They are described as being rooted to the floor and looking frightened and embarrassed when Mr. Weasley arrives.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who disengages herself from her mother to join the group. She is described as joining the group.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a person who arrives at the Dursleys' house and greets Uncle Vernon. He is described as being pleasant and having demolished most of the living room two years previously.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is a person who glares at Mr. Weasley but chooses not to say anything. He is described as turning a deeper shade of puce and being outnumbered two to one.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is a person who looks frightened and embarrassed when Mr. Weasley arrives. She is described as glancing around in terror that someone she knows will see her.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is a person who tries to look small and insignificant but fails extravagantly. He is described as being part of the Dursleys' family.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley greets Uncle Vernon when he arrives at the Dursleys' house.
Mr. Weasley visits the Dursleys' house and is greeted by Uncle Vernon.
Hermione joins a group of people, which includes Mr. Weasley and the Dursleys.
